text: Xianzhi [mu sheng] a! Nimen xiu qi shi, nimen dang zai tamen de dai hunqi nei xiu tamen. Nimen dang jisuan [tamen de] dai hunqixian. Nimen dang jingwei an la——nimen de zhu. Nimen buyao ba tamen gan chu tamen de [zhangfu de] jia [zhu], tamen ye bude shanzi likai, chufei tamen fan you mingxian de jianyin. Zhe shi an la de fadu. Shei chaoyue an la de fadu, shei que yi shi ziji shou sun. Ni [xiu qi zhe] bu zhi dao, yexu an la hui zai cihou shi yi jian xin shi chuxian [ru ta jia gei ling yi wei zhangfu lihun hou, you yu ni fuhun].
